name: Jquery-limit-lines
tagline: A jQuery plugin to limit the maximum input lines of contenteditable div
body:
### Introduction.
jQuery limitLines is a simple plug-in to limit the maximum input lines of div with contenteditable attribute. 

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Usage

> $('div').limitLine({
>         limitLines: 2
>     });


### License
Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License

### Authors and Contributors
Kenny.SW Lee <kswlee@gmail.com> (kswlee @ github), http://www.kennylee.co 

### Known issues
1. If the input cursor is in the middle of the content, the trailing text would be trimmed 
1. For Chinese input, it might not work as the temp phonetic input would cause the limit handler to trim the content
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
